page.title: 10Recreation and Leisure
page.content: The old army camp in Maresfield has been knocked down and they are building a{new indoor bowls club.They started building on the 29th April 1985 and hope to finish in October 1985.The name of the company building it is called Cignet.It will have a {restaurant and bar}.It will have six bowling rinks.It will cost Â£375,000. There will be an{outside bowling green.There is a building left from the army camp where people play {badminton and indoor football.There are{two tennis courts}next to it.There are{Cubs}and{Brownies}meetings at Maresfield Bonners school.Grown ups go to the village hall and play{bingo,}or to attend the{Womens Institute,}or {History Society. by Lee
